name: New York Christmas
description:
• Description

Bad luck for Santa Claus on this Christmas Eve : his sleigh is broken and his reindeers are on strike! He needs now to deliver presents to all the New York City children...

You will have to jump from roof to roof, gather scattered presents to feed the targetted chimney with the help of a secret weapon... Icy Tentacles!

Discover the 10 first levels of this frozen Christmas night !

• Controls

WASD — Move

Mouse — Look around

E — Interact

LeftClick — Grow an icy tentacle
